This isn't clone. The meaning of clone is ISO, not extracted files. This is ready-to-play extraction.

Clone is usually ISO, which means you can mount it as DVD/CD and install from it. You can still use some russian ISO-clone and overwrite other files from this torrent to gain advantage of limited edition. That's what I did.

Downloaded Russian version, installed a game, copied game directory to torrent download directory so this torrent wouldn't download unnecessary files (which are already existant) - I had about 60-70% completed. Finished the torrent and copied all other files to game directory. Sounds complicated, but doable if you know what you're doing.
